title: Cant connect to chat
body: I have internet access and I have been playing games no problem. But for the last few hours I can not connect to chat and cant duo queue because of it. I have tried resetting my computer/client/internet no luck.

replies.body: Hmmmm that's a little strange. The chat servers are actually separate from the game servers so it might just be a weird hiccup with your connection not being able to reach the chat. Check out your network settings, specifically the port forwarding section, really quickly for me using this as a guide -> [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
